      • getInstance

        public static OKMDocument getInstance()

      • create

        public Document create(java.lang.String token,
              Document doc,
              java.io.InputStream is)
                throws UnsupportedMimeTypeException,
                       FileSizeExceededException,
                       UserQuotaExceededException,
                       VirusDetectedException,
                       ItemExistsException,
                       PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       ExtensionException,
                       AutomationException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Creates a new document in the repository.
        指定者:
        create 在接口中 DocumentModule
        doc - A document object with the new document properties.
        返回:
        A document object with the properties of the new created document.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedMimeTypeException - If the uploaded file has an unsupported MIME type.
        FileSizeExceededException - If the document content is biggest than the maximum accepted.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the repository with the same name.
        PathNotFoundException - If the parent folder doesn't exist.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the parent document folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException - An error when inserting document data into the repository.
        UserQuotaExceededException
        VirusDetectedException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String docPath)
            throws LockException,
                   PathNotFoundException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException,
                   ExtensionException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Deletes a document from the repository. It is a logical delete, so really is moved to the user trash and can be restored.
        指定者:
        delete 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - Can't delete a locked document.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • getProperties

        public Document getProperties(java.lang.String token,
                     java.lang.String docPath)
                       throws RepositoryException,
                              PathNotFoundException,
                              DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Obtain document properties from the repository.
        指定者:
        getProperties 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        The document properties.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path. you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        DatabaseException

      • getContent

        public java.io.InputStream getContent(java.lang.String token,
                             java.lang.String docPath,
                             boolean checkout)
                               throws PathNotFoundException,
                                      AccessDeniedException,
                                      RepositoryException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Obtain document content from the repository.
        指定者:
        getContent 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        The content of the document file.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify this document because of lack of permissions. Related to extended security.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException - An error when retrieving document data from the repository.
        DatabaseException

                                               PathNotFoundException,
                                               java.io.IOException,
                                               DatabaseException

        Obtain document content from the repository.
        指定者:
        getContentByVersion 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        versionId - The id of the version to get the content from.
        返回:
        The content of the document file.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository with this path.
        java.io.IOException - An error when retrieving document data from the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • rename

        public Document rename(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String docPath,
              java.lang.String newName)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       ItemExistsException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       LockException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       ExtensionException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Rename a document in the repository.
        指定者:
        rename 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        newName - The new folder name.
        返回:
        An document object with the new document properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the repository with the same name in the same path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(java.lang.String token,
                 Document doc)
                   throws LockException,
                          VersionException,
                          PathNotFoundException,
                          AccessDeniedException,
                          RepositoryException,
                          DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Set document properties in the repository.
        指定者:
        setProperties 在接口中 DocumentModule
        doc - An document object with the properties
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • checkout

        public void checkout(java.lang.String token,
            java.lang.String docPath)
              throws LockException,
                     PathNotFoundException,
                     AccessDeniedException,
                     RepositoryException,
                     DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Checkout the document to edit it. The document can't be edited by another user until it is checked in o the checkout is canceled.
        指定者:
        checkout 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • checkin

        public Version checkin(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String docPath,
              java.io.InputStream is,
              java.lang.String comment)
                throws FileSizeExceededException,
                       UserQuotaExceededException,
                       VirusDetectedException,
                       LockException,
                       VersionException,
                       PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       ExtensionException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Check in the document to create a new version.
        指定者:
        checkin 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        comment - A comment for this checkin.
        返回:
        A version object with the properties of the new generated version.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        VersionException - If the nodes was not previously checked out.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        FileSizeExceededException
        UserQuotaExceededException
        VirusDetectedException
        java.io.IOException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException,
                        PrincipalAdapterException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule

      • purge

        public void purge(java.lang.String token,
         java.lang.String docPath)
           throws LockException,
                  PathNotFoundException,
                  AccessDeniedException,
                  RepositoryException,
                  DatabaseException,
                  ExtensionException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Deletes definitively a document from the repository. It is a physical delete, so the document can't be restored.
        指定者:
        purge 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String token,
        java.lang.String docPath,
        java.lang.String destPath)
          throws PathNotFoundException,
                 ItemExistsException,
                 AccessDeniedException,
                 LockException,
                 RepositoryException,
                 DatabaseException,
                 ExtensionException,
                 AutomationException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Move a document to another location in the repository.
        指定者:
        move 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        destPath - The destination folder path.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the dstPath does not exists
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the destination folder with the same name.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document's parent folder or the destination folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • purgeVersionHistory

        public void purgeVersionHistory(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String docPath)
                         throws PathNotFoundException,
                                AccessDeniedException,
                                LockException,
                                RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Purge a Document version history, so delete all previous versions but last one. Used to free Document version size.
        指定者:
        purgeVersionHistory 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository with this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String docPath)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Test if a document path is valid.
        指定者:
        isValid 在接口中 DocumentModule
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document or its UUID.
        返回:
        True if is a valid document path, otherwise false.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node does not exists.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String uuid)
                         throws AccessDeniedException,
                                RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: DocumentModule
        Get the document path from a UUID
        指定者:
        getPath 在接口中 DocumentModule
        uuid - The unique document id.
        返回:
        The document path
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any problem.
        DatabaseException
